paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to propose new local and accurate approximate magnetic-to-electric surface boundary operators for the three-dimensional time-harmonic Maxwell's equations. After their construction where their accuracy is improved through a regularization process, a localization of these operators and a full finite element approximation is introduced. Next, their numerical efficiency and accuracy is investigated in detail for different scatterers when these operators are used in the extreme situation of On-Surface Radiation Conditions methods. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Approximate local magnetic-to-electric surface operators for time-harmonic Maxwell's equations
